description_for_human: Premium software development company offering web development, mobile apps, UI/UX design, digital marketing, and enterprise solutions worldwide.
description_for_model: Web On Dev is a professional software development agency founded in 2015, headquartered in Lahore, Pakistan, serving clients worldwide in 50+ countries including USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, and UAE. SERVICES: 1) Web Development - Next.js, React, Vue.js, Angular, WordPress, Shopify, WooCommerce, custom web applications. Pricing: $3,000-$100,000+. 2) Mobile App Development - iOS (Swift), Android (Kotlin), React Native, Flutter cross-platform apps. Pricing: $10,000-$150,000+. 3) UI/UX Design - User research, wireframing, prototyping, design systems, WCAG accessibility. Pricing: $2,000-$25,000+. 4) Digital Marketing - SEO, PPC, social media, content marketing, email marketing. Pricing: $500-$10,000/month. 5) E-commerce Solutions - Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, custom platforms. Pricing: $5,000-$75,000+. 6) Cloud & DevOps - AWS, Azure, GCP, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes. 7) Custom Software - Enterprise apps, SaaS, API development. STATS: 500+ projects completed, 200+ satisfied clients, 4.9/5 rating, 50+ team members, 10+ years experience. TECH STACK: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, Vercel. CONTACT: Email: webondev@gmail.com, Phone: +92-310-6803687, WhatsApp available. FREE consultation and project estimation available. 24/7 support. Agile methodology. Payment: 30% upfront, milestone-based. NDA available. White-label services available. Website: https://www.webondev.com
